General.Name: Data International Co Ltd
General.Description: Solomon Data International Corporation manufactures and sells liquid crystal display (LCD) modules in Taiwan and China. The company's LCD modules include mono, intelligent, and integrated LCM, as well as TFT modules and coding system services. It sells its products to manufacturers and distributors in various industries, such as manufacturers of communication products, computers and computer-related products, computer networking equipment, industrial equipment, navigation, transportation, instrumentation, and medical equipment. Solomon Data International Corporation was founded in 1990 and is based in Taipei, Taiwan.
